long_description: The classic Swiss Army Cadet Alox knife is precision-crafted for quality and durability. Grippy metal handles, aluminum housings and stainless-steel components offer long-lasting use for all kinds of outdoor adventures. Stainless-steel blade holds an edge for versatile cutting. The Swiss Army Cadet Alox knife features a can opener, bottle opener, 2 standard screwdrivers, nail file, wire stripper and key ring.
short_description: The classic Swiss Army Cadet Alox knife is precision-crafted for quality and durability.
